articles.title: Share Market Highlights 29 January 2024: Sensex, Nifty surge nearly 2%; oil & gas, bank stocks shine - BusinessLine
articles.description: Sensex, Nifty updates on 29 January 2024: Benchmark equity indices Sensex and Nifty rebounded sharply on Monday, surging nearly 2 per cent, on heavy buying in Reliance Industries and a rally in Asian markets. The BSE Sensex jumped 1,240.90 points or 1.76 per …
articles.content: • January 29, 2024 16:23Currency Market Today: Rupee falls 3 paise to close at 83.14 against US dollar The rupee depreciated 3 paise to 83.14 (provisional) against the US dollar on Monday, … [+88596 chars]
